title: How to Recognize the Devil: Common Sense Self Defense, Safety, & Security
description: Would you recognize evil? Theft, abduction, abuse, rape, robbery, murder -- all crimes committed by devils too often disguised. Now you can learn to recognize them and stay safe. Criminologist and crime prevention expert Judith A. Yates has taught safety classes for over 25 years. Classes are a unique combination of years of working in law enforcement and criminal justice education. Now all of the classes have been combined in this book. As a bonus, worksheets and note pages are included. Domestic violence prevention, signs of abuse in nursing homes, travel safety, child safety, home security, and more, plus a chapter on crazy crimes. This is important information anyone can use to help stay safe.
author: Judith A. Yates
